title: Merge pull request #3 from leenephi/master
message:
Merge pull request #3 from leenephi/master

Manifest needs call for each activity

title: I got it working. The call of the .MainActivity was deleted in the manifest when…
message: I got it working. The call of the .MainActivity was deleted in the manifest when it still needs to be there (All activities need to be called there). After doing that, it still didn't work until I took out the 'singleinstance' thing in the manifest under .Home. I just put the 'singleinstance' back under .MainActivity and both the menu and the game work again. :)
